## JsonContextHelper.extendContext() method

Static helper to extend context variables and references for a supplied [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static extendContext(baseContext?: IJsonContext | undefined, add?: {
        vars?: VariableValue[];
        refs?: IJsonReferenceMap[];
    }): Result<IJsonContext | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

baseContext


</td><td>

[IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) \| undefined


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) to be extended, or `undefined` to start from an empty context.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

add


</td><td>

{ vars?: [VariableValue](./ts-json.variablevalue.md)<!-- -->\[\]; refs?: [IJsonReferenceMap](./ts-json.ijsonreferencemap.md)<!-- -->\[\]; }


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional initializer containing [variable values](./ts-json.variablevalue.md) and/or [reference maps](./ts-json.ijsonreferencemap.md) to be added to the [context](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Result&lt;[IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) \| undefined&gt;

`Success` with a new [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) containing the variables and references from the base context, merged with and overridden by any that were passed in, or `Failure` with a message if an error occurs.
